content: Add Helper Types and Methods - EnumFieldDescriptor in path_kind.rs, variant_names methods in recursion_context.rs and types.rs
Change HashMap Type Throughout Enum Processing (ATOMIC) - Update process_children, build_variant_example, build_enum_examples to use HashMap<EnumFieldDescriptor, Value>
Add Root Example Building and Integration - Add build_root_examples_for_chains and update_paths_with_root_examples functions, modify process_enum
Validation and Testing - Run cargo nextest run and verify TestVariantChainEnum has correct root examples
